DOC.detailed_description: Study design : During six month intervention group meal family style , control group receive usual tray service . Hypothesis : We hypothesize intervention program positive effect quality life , food intake , body weight , physical performance , biochemical data ( hematocrit , hemoglobin , leucocytes , ferretin , albumin , homocysteine folate ) among resident intervention group , outcome measure would regularly decline among resident control group . Site participant : Nursing home volunteer participate study . In nurse home control intervention ward . Only resident chronic somatic disorder include . Residents exclude terminal phase disease , total parenteral feeding able give inform consent due physical mental condition . The ethical committee client board nursing home medical ethical committee Wageningen University approve study protocol . Intervention : The intervention program last six month base inventory research mealtime ambiance model Netherlands . The program consist five aspect : table dressing , food service , staff protocol , resident ' protocol , mealtime protocol . Before start meal , table set tablecloth , full cutlery plate . The cooked meal serve dish resident opportunity choose two kind vegetable , two kind meat potato .
